sen.e: It is considered that the description of Ashihara no nakatsukuni was based on the process of unifying country by Yamato sovereignty (the ancient Japan sovereignty).

sen.j: 記紀で出雲が国譲りの舞台として書かれているのは、出雲が最後に残った勢力で、出雲の平定により一応の国家統一が達成されたと考えられたためとされている。
sen.e: It is said that the reason why Izumo Province was the setting for the kuniyuzuri in Kojiki and Nihonshoki is that Izumo was the last province that was not unified, and pacification of Izumo completed unifying the country.

sen.e: It is said that the reason why Izumo Province was the setting for the kuniyuzuri in Kojiki and Nihonshoki is that Izumo was the last province and the unifying the country was completed with the pacification of Izumo.

sen.j: 又、すでに出雲を中心とする勢力によって統一されていた古代ヤマト王権が別の勢力によって滅ぼされ、政権交代を正当化する為に後から創られたものであるとも考えられる。
sen.e: There is another opinion that the ancient Yamato sovereignty, which had already unified by the leading power of Izumo, was destroyed by the other powerful province, and the tale was created later in order to justify the regime change.
